name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Proficient in **Python**, **gRPC**, and developing **REST APIs**, I am an innovative Full Stack Developer with **8** years of impactful experience. My technical arsenal includes **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and a solid understanding of **CI/CD pipelines**, enabling me to create efficient, modern applications utilizing a robust cloud architecture. I excel in both **microservices architectures** and **monolithic architectures**, contributing effectively to diverse team projects and optimizing development workflows.

I bring original strengths in problem-solving and team collaboration, having successfully led projects in the healthcare and financial sectors. I am well-versed in building high-performance solutions with technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, while ensuring applications meet rigorous compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My experience also encompasses **AI/ML integration** for enhanced data analytics and automation, reflecting my commitment to innovation and technological excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and optimized **REST APIs** and **gRPC** services using **Python** for efficient communication between microservices in a **Kubernetes**-based architecture.
- Assisted in the implementation of **CI/CD pipelines** with **Docker** and GitHub Actions to streamline application deployment and enhance operational efficiency.
- Collaborated in a team environment to support the transition from **monolithic architectures** to **microservices architectures**, improving scalability and maintainability of applications.
- Contributed to problem-solving sessions to identify and address performance bottlenecks in the system, ensuring high availability and responsiveness.
- Gained hands-on experience in containerization and orchestration through **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to deploy and manage applications in cloud environments.
- Engaged in simplification of complex processes and workflows, enhancing team productivity and project delivery timelines.
- Participated in code reviews and collaborative coding exercises that fostered **team collaboration** and improved code quality across multiple project teams.
- Communicated effectively in **English** with cross-functional teams, facilitating the understanding of technical concepts and project updates.
- Involved in troubleshooting and debugging issues within the application stack, honing problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
- Developed documentation and project reports to capture processes and solutions, aiding in knowledge sharing and future reference.

• Participated in the development of microservices architectures using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to boost scalability and maintainability in high-volume transaction systems for an internship project.
• Collaborated with team members to create user-focused front-end applications utilizing **React** (v18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, employing **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** for enhanced performance and responsiveness of financial dashboards.
• Assisted in the development of real-time transaction monitoring and analytics tools with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded** to provide insights into financial activities and assist in detecting anomalies.
• Helped integrate **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to support asynchronous communication and real-time event processing, enhancing event-driven application architectures.
• Contributed to building ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for both batch and real-time data ingestion, effectively handling financial data from diverse sources.
• Supported the implementation of AI/ML fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** to analyze transaction patterns and user behavior, assisting in flagging suspicious activities within banking systems.
• Engaged in creating ML pipelines focused on credit scoring and transaction classification integrated with **MLflow** and **Airflow** for real-time decision-making efforts, reinforcing the project’s data-driven strategies.
• Gained experience collaborating within team settings and improving problem-solving skills while simplifying complex technical processes in developmental tasks.

- Developed and optimized **REST APIs** using **Python** in microservices architectures to ensure efficient backend performance, cross-functional communication, and scalability in a global e-commerce platform.
- Collaborated in a team environment to implement **CI/CD pipelines** utilizing **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, streamlining the deployment process and reducing time to market by **30%**.
- Employed **gRPC** for high-performance communication between services, significantly improving data exchange speeds and system responsiveness by **50%**.
- Contributed to real-time data processing and feature implementation through responsive client-server communication, enhancing user experience and system interaction.
- Assisted in the transition from monolithic architectures to microservices, implementing **problem-solving** strategies to address architectural challenges and optimizing system performance.
- Engaged in team collaboration to maintain documentation and knowledge sharing, improving team efficiency and project delivery outcomes.
- Demonstrated proficiency in English for effective communication within the team and with stakeholders, ensuring clarity in project requirements and deliverables.
- Applied principles of **simplification** to refine development processes, improving code quality and reducing complexity across multiple service layers.
